person.persName: Leonard Clements Jr. (Union County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Leonard Clements and Susan Clements. Married to Elizabeth Boone Clements in Union County, Kentucky, on January 9, 1843. Father of Philip Clements, William Clements, Mary E. Clements, John A. Clements, Edward B. Clements, and Fannie Clements. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Employed James M. Shoemaker as a laborer in Union County in 1860. Owned fifteen enslaved persons in Union County in 1860. Farmer in Union County in 1863.
